You're telling me Bangchan, the shy guy who turns red just trying to flirt & Lee Know who doesn't indulge in flirting (unless of course, it's with members) while having the spiciest mind (og bundles barely survived) made a song that has such double entendres. author: @h-playwithmyhart.4806
text: Minho. Deciding to support Stray Kids has been one of the best decisions I’ve made two four ago and in my life overall. I know that this year has been hard for most people, me included, but one of the only people continuing to give me hope is you. When I first got introduced to Stray Kids almost some years ago, you were one of the first people that caught my attention. All of the members stood out to me, and for you, what I noticed first was your smile. When I watched my first ever Stray Kids video, it was simply your warm smile that immediately invited me in and made me want to get to know you and your members more. Last year, especially because we were all in quarantine, I have done exactly that. I spent a large amount of my free time getting to know you and become acquainted with your position on Stray Kids as well as your personality as an individual. What started with your smile led to me become captivated by your entire performance. Your sweet and versatile voice allows you to both sing and rap effortlessly and it always compliments every style of song that Stray Kids creates. Of course, your charm resides in your status are one of the most incredible and unmatchable dancers to ever exist. I have watched you dance in many different events and I can say I have never seen someone with as much control, whose movements flow naturally from one to the next, before you. You are an influential dancer and you tell a story every time you do so. Overall, you are an outstanding performer and an incredible musician and artist overall. You are a significant and vital part of the creation process of every single Stray Kids project, and it has been mesmerizing watching all of your songs and content come to life. Outside of your impressive performance etiquette, another reason that I have fallen more in love with you over the past year is because of your personality. I have come to know by watching various forms of Stray Kids content, and also from STAY, that you can be quiet in certain situations and don’t always say much. However, you also have the ability to be very vocal and inclusive in any Stray Kids activities. There is so much beauty in that you don’t even have to say much at all, but you mean so much to your members because when you do speak, what you say is either extremely meaningful or humorous. You always make your members laugh in the most unexpected moments and I have spent many joyous moments laughing alongside you, STAY, and your members because of your unique, spontaneous humor. On top of this, you speak your mind when it matters most and you always seem to have the most insightful words to give about the moment you are in. I have come to know that you are a person who is very aware of his surroundings and that you value your members very much. Because of this, there is beauty both in your silence, because you are an observant person, and in your words because they are always full of value and inspiration. I can see a lot of similarities from my personality to yours, and I know than that is one of the reasons why I gravitative towards you. You have offered me a lot of comfort and laughter over the past year and I wish that there was something that I can do personally to repay you for how grateful I am. However, I know that I am not the only person who feels this way. There are a lot of STAY around the world who have similar personality traits and respond to the world around them in the way that you do, and it makes each of them feel more confident and comfortable. Another reason that I came to respect you so much, as is the case with your other members, is because of STAY. They love you so much and look up to you for multiple different reasons. I have also seen, because of your unique personality that STAY are a group of people that can understand you in a way that nobody else can. I find the relationship that you have built with your STAY something that is so special and unbreakable. Similarly, I love the relationship that you have established with your members as well. I can tell how much your members love and appreciate you and they exercise this in many different ways regularly. I aspire to have a relationship with my friends that is like family in the same way that you have a relationship with your members. I want to personally thank your parents and family for being a key factor in your success and upbringing; both musically and personally. I know that they love you in a way that nobody else does and that they raised you and encouraged you to be as strong and generous as you are today. They are the most proud of you and support you the most! I know you have gone through so much already, more than many people can say that have, despite not being active for very long yet. The ways in which you have recovered and persevered through your hardships is very inspirational and serves as motivation for STAY everywhere to never give up. Lee Know, STAY are so proud of you and are absolutely grateful for everything that you have done for us this far, which is already more than we could ever ask for. I hope that you never change because we love and accept you exactly the way you are and take comfort in the persona that you present to us. Thank you for working so hard every day, even before debut, to bring us so much entertainment and life-changing music. You are so legendary in the music world and you will always be respected and admired as such. My only regret is not become a STAY sooner, but I know that the unconditional love I have for you now makes up for my absence. I can’t wait to see what you do in the future and I hope that you continue to evolve, improve, and grow with Stray Kids and personally for your own sake. I hope that you continue to work to achieve all of your dreams and get as much out of life as you desire. I want to wish you, from the bottom of my heart and on behalf of your friends, STAY, members, and most importantly, your family, the most beautiful and magical birthday that you can have because you deserve it. May it be everything that you wish for and even better than that! Thank you for accepting me into such a loving family and STAY will always support you and be by your side no matter what happens. I pray that you remain in high spirits and great health, and that you and your loved ones find happiness and worth in everything that they do. Happy Birthday and we adore you!!!

[Intro]
Start the engine, rev. it up, tonight we drive
Goin’ non-stop, feel the heat inside
Baby I can do this every day and night
Trust me babe, I promise it’s just you and I

Start the engine, rev. it up, tonight we drive
Goin’ non-stop, feel the heat inside
Baby, baby we gon’ do it day and night
Not holdin’ back, tonight it’s our drive

[Verse 1]
Moonlight shining down bright on your skin
Like something that I’ve seen in my dreams
You’re like a light lighting up the darkened path, yeah
Take my hand, I wanna take you anywhere

[Pre-Chorus]
Ri-ri-ride on the highway to heaven
Us two, got a special connection
Relax, baby, show all your colours
We’ll do this forever

[Chorus]
Start the engine, rev. it up, tonight we drive
Goin’ non-stop, feel the heat inside
Baby I can do this every day and night
Trust me babe, I promise it’s just you and I

Start the engine, rev. it up, tonight we drive
Goin’ non-stop, feel the heat inside
Baby, baby we gon’ do it day and night
Don’t hold back ‘cause tonight it’s our drive

[Verse 2]
We’ll be dancing with the shadows of the night
The stars are jealous knowing that you’re by my side
Feel the adrenaline, acceleration
In the course, we’ll be drivin’ so rough

Ride like the motions of the ocean
High tide in the moonlight
One way emotion, satisfaction (skrrt skrrt)
We ain’t stopping now

[Pre-Chorus]
Up until the end I know won’t let go
Speed up, so just hold on as we go
A dream, where I’m heading to the top with you, oh 
Cause we don’t give a (uh)

[Chorus]
Start the engine, rev. it up, tonight we drive
Goin’ non-stop, feel the heat inside
Baby I can do this every day and night
Trust me babe, I promise it’s just you and I

Start the engine, rev. it up, tonight we drive
Goin’ non-stop, feel the heat inside
Baby, baby we gon’ do it day and night
Don’t worry, it’s you and I

[Outro]
(Drive) Ooh yeah
(Drive) Drive with me baby yeah
(Drive) In the course, in the night
Drive

author: @andiedrealessandra
text:
Channie: It’s about driving…yeah..that’s what the song is about….its says it right there in the lyrics and we’re even on motorbikes 🏍️ 😇

Chrizztopher’s Lyrics: 

(I have a theory Chrizz takes over when Chan is asleep. We should monitor him for research purposes lol)

“In the course (I laugh at how many people didn’t get this one) we’ll be driving so rough….. 🤭

Drive non stop feel the heat inside 
Baby,I can do this every day and night or  baby, baby we gonna do it day and night.🫡 Yes Sir! Whatever you say! I’m hydrated( super important to stay hydrated while driving) and ready for this “day and night drive”

You don’t need to hold back it’s our drive….😮‍💨

We'll be dancin' with the shadows in the night….(We’ve gone from driving to “dancing”)🙂‍↔️

The entire bridge needs to be included:

I won't let you go until the ending
Hold on tight as it speeds up
Again, I dream of heading to the top with you oh….(You’re driving but you’re holding onto me until the ending?? And you’re heading to the “top”. I hear you) 😏😮‍💨😵🥵 

But yes! This is a song about Driving and if either of them ever need a co pilot/passenger/driving companion I happily will volunteer.

Siri play
“Dirty mind dirty….mind…dir…dir..dir..d…..dirty mind.”

If anyone feels
the same way about Drive let me know.  

Maybe I’m just wired differently 😂
It’s still a bop and I love these two together. Their vocals blend so well. Could you imagine being in the room for the writing process though?

I bet they were like “How do we make Stays even more 🥵 and delulu without saying anything straightforwardly?” 
🌺🫶🏻🌺



In the course. In the night. 

So Channie didn’t write these lyrics Chrizztopher did! He also wrote Red Lights and Connected.

text:
Stray Kids - Drive (Bang Chan, Lee Know) - текст песни 

시동 걸어 놓고 오늘 밤도 drive
쉬지 않고 달려 feel the heat inside
Baby I can do this every day and night
오늘 밤은 나만 믿고 따라와

시동 걸어 놓고 오늘 밤도 drive
쉬지 않고 달려 feel the heat inside
Baby, baby we gon' do it day and night
참을 필요 없어 너와 나의 drive

은은한 달빛 속에서 너를 간직해
꿈에선 이 장면 많이 본 듯해
어두운 길을 밝혀주는 가로등 같애 yeah
책임지고 어디든 데려갈게

Ride on the highway to heaven
단둘만의 special connection
맘 편하게 show all your colours

We'll do this forever

시동 걸어 놓고 오늘 밤도 drive
쉬지 않고 달려 feel the heat inside
Baby I can do this every day and night
오늘 밤은 나만 믿고 따라와

시동 걸어 놓고 오늘 밤도 drive
쉬지 않고 달려 feel the heat inside
Baby, baby we gon' do it day and night
참을 필요 없어 너와 나의 drive

We'll be dancin' with the shadows in the night
The stars are jealous knowing that you're by my side
Feel the adrenaline, acceleration
In the course, we'll be drivin' so rough

Ride like the motions of the ocean
High tide in the moonlight
One way emotion, satisfaction
(Skrrt skrrt) We ain't stopping now

결말까지 널 놓지 않겠어
꽉 잡아 속도 올라갈수록
정상을 향해 또 너랑 꿈꿔 oh

author: @user-digitalfarmgirl
text:
I know what it's about. IT'S about driving with the windows up in the Summer (where I live it is 116° in the summer) & the air conditioning is broken, but they're just pretending that they have air conditioning & that is why, the  inside of the car is so steaming hot. Everyone in the car is pretending to be chillin' like villains, even though they are sweatin' like hostages. They are saying that they could do this FOREVER and that they could do this all the way to heaven, they add that it is much easier to do this at night , because it's not as hot. THAT is what the song is about. Right? When I lived in Mexico , there was a joke about people driving with their windows up in summer, so that it looked like they had air conditioning in their car , when in fact, they did not . The strangest thing 
I EVER saw in Mexico, regarding a car, was a car with 3 tires , being drawn by a little grey donkey.  The whole  family with their dog even, was sitting on top of the roof & the hood, of this green, 1973 or 1974 Chevy Nova. By The Way, In Spanish, 
"no va", means
 "no go".

author: @BloomzMember
text:
Thanks, Bang Chan and Lee Know❣️
I was rebuilding and updating a Summer Jam Playlist when I realized 'Drive' was published in 2021 - two years ago, almost to the day.
Still a great song!  Using it for an upcoming "Road Trip" (long drive, here in the States), and for camping jams.
Great job, gentlemen! 👏👏👏👍👍🤘🤜🤛

author: @Quelealive
text:
At first I thought this song was a bit meh, plain, dull.
Then Bang Chan said the song was only about driving. (but we know SKZ LOVES to give one version and let the fans imagine the rest)
Then Bang Chan also said only Lee Know wrote I have nothing to do with it
Then a thousands memes came to life.
And now I love the song because of all said above it gives it a great vibe. Without all that, it would just be a song. But know it's iconic and unmissable.

author: @wow_thats_REALLY_funny
text:
i can just imagine the conversation chan and lee know had before this was released

chan: so you know how this song's actually not about driving right?
lee know: yeah, but what will tell the stays?
chan: i have this foolproof plan where I'll tell all of them that it's just about driving, which they'll all believe because that's literally the title of the song.
lee know: uh yeah... for some reason i feel like that's not going to work out like you think it will.
lee know: do you have a plan b?
chan: *mumbling* i was just gonna tell them that you wrote all the lyrics.
lee know: what was that?
chan: omg sorry! i have to go seungmin's calling me.

author: @h-playwithmyhart.4806
text: Minho. Deciding to support Stray Kids has been one of the best decisions I’ve made so far in my life. I know that this year has been tough for most people, me included, but one of the only people continuing to give me hope is you. When I first got introduced to Stray Kids almost three years ago, you were one of the first people that caught my attention. All of the members stood out to me, and for you, what I noticed first was your smile. When I watched my first ever Stray Kids video, it was simply your warm smile that immediately invited me in and made me want to get to know you and your members more. I have spent a large amount of my free time getting to know you and become acquainted with your position on Stray Kids as well as your personality as an individual. What started with your smile led to me become captivated by your entire performance. Your sweet and versatile voice allows you to both sing and rap effortlessly and it always compliments every style of song that Stray Kids creates. Of course, your charm resides in your status are one of the most incredible and unmatchable dancers to ever exist. I have watched you dance in many different events and I can say I have never seen someone with as much control, whose movements flow naturally from one to the next, before you. You are an influential dancer and you tell a story every time you do so. Overall, you are an outstanding performer and an incredible musician and artist overall. You are a significant and vital part of the creation process of every single Stray Kids project, and it has been mesmerizing watching all of your songs and content come to life. Outside of your impressive performance etiquette, another reason that I have fallen even more in love with you is because of your personality. I have come to know by watching various forms of Stray Kids content, and also from STAY, that you can be quiet in certain situations and don’t always say much. However, you also have the ability to be very vocal and inclusive in any Stray Kids activities. There is so much beauty in that you don’t even have to say much at all, but you mean so much to your members because when you do speak, what you say is either extremely meaningful or humorous. You always make your members laugh in the most unexpected moments and I have spent many joyous moments laughing alongside you, STAY, and your members because of your unique, spontaneous humor. On top of this, you speak your mind when it matters most and you always seem to have the most insightful words to give about the moment you are in. I have come to know that you are a person who is very aware of his surroundings and that you value your members very much. Because of this, there is beauty both in your silence, because STAY knows you are personally reflecting on the state of you and your members, and in your words as well, because they are always full of value and inspiration. I can see a lot of similarities from my personality to yours, and I know that that is one of the reasons why I gravitative towards you. You have offered me a lot of comfort and laughter and I wish that there was something that I can do personally to repay you for how grateful I am. However, I know that I am not the only person who feels this way. There are a lot of STAY around the world who have similar personality traits and respond to the world around them in the way that you do, and it makes each of them feel more confident and comfortable. Another reason that I came to respect you so much, as is the case with your other members, is because of STAY. They love you so much and look up to you for multiple different reasons. I have also seen, because of your unique personality that STAY are a group of people that can understand you in a way that nobody else can. I find the relationship that you have built with your STAY something that is so special and unbreakable. Similarly, I love the relationship that you have established with your members as well. I can tell how much your members love and appreciate you and they exercise this in many different ways regularly. I aspire to have a relationship with my friends that is like family in the same way that you have a relationship with your members. I want to personally thank your parents and family for being a key factor in your success and upbringing; both musically and personally. I know that they love you in a way that nobody else does and that they raised you and encouraged you to be as strong and generous as you are today. They are the most proud of you and support you the most! I know you have gone through so much already, more than many people can say that have, despite not being active for very long yet. The ways in which you have recovered and persevered through your hardships is very inspirational and serves as motivation for STAYS everywhere to never give up. Lee Know, STAY are so proud of you and are absolutely grateful for everything that you have done for us this far, which is already more than we could ever ask for. I hope that you never change because we love and accept you exactly the way you are and take comfort in the persona that you present to us. Thank you for working so hard every day, even before debut, to bring us so much entertainment and life-changing music. You are so legendary in the music world and you will always be respected and admired as such. My only regret is not become a STAY sooner, but I know that the unconditional love I have for you now makes up for my absence. I can’t wait to see what you do in the future and I hope that you continue to evolve, improve, and grow with Stray Kids and personally for your own sake. I hope that you continue to work to achieve all of your dreams and get as much out of life as you desire. I want to wish you, from the bottom of my heart and on behalf of your friends, STAY, members, and most importantly, your family, the most beautiful and magical birthday that you can have because you deserve it. May it be everything that you wish for and even better that that! Thank you for accepting me into such a loving family and STAY will always support you and be by your side no matter what happens. I pray that you remain in high spirits and great health, and that you and your loved ones find happiness and worth in everything that they do. Happy Birthday and we adore you!!!

author: @by_joy
text:
Hey Chris~~~~ It's your birthday again 
And again, I'm here! It's funny, right? I also didn't care much about my birthday but after meeting you guys I love to celebrate yours and I really would love to celebrate mine with you too. I guess that's because I'm really grateful that one year more I could live by your side. One year more I could see you grow and get older. When a birthday comes, I realize that I've been living 365 days loving you. It's different than before. I really worry about you everyday and I think how are you feeling, if you're eating, if you're healthy. I don't you to feel pressure about any of this, I just wanna say that your birthday is important, because you are. Right now, this Christopher, this version of you, is exactly the way it should be. And YES, I KNOW you wanna get better and etc etc but that doesn't mean that right now, you're this lovely and awesome human being. Just shut up and accept it, OK??? 
I know it's hard, I know pretty well.. but you've been doing well and I'm so proud of you. One year more. Thank you for everything you do, and I'll be even more thankfull if I could do just a bit for you too. 

Have the best birthday ever
And have the best year ever
And I hope you feel deep in your heart how loved you are
Love you always 


Joy

author: @h-playwithmyhart.4806
text: Bang Chan. As I’ve frequently noted, I have been a K-Pop fan for almost a decade but I have never seen somebody like you in the musical field before. What you have been and are capable of, is absolutely untouchable and I’ve learned that there is nothing that can take the sincerity and passion out of your character. I will say, despite being a long-time fan of K-Pop, I didn’t become a Stay until the just a few years ago. I don’t know how I went so long without knowing or supporting Stray Kids sooner, but I am completely and utterly thrilled to be a Stay now. To this day I wouldn’t know about Stray Kids if it weren’t for the Stay. I heard so much conversation among the fans of Stray Kids about how fearless of a leader you were, and I became curious. Over the course of those few years, I have spent my free time, which I lately have a lot of, getting to know you and your members. It started with liking a few songs, but then Stay, who talk with so much praise about you and your members, convinced me to see what was lying beneath the meaning of your music. I began to watch Stray Kids content whenever and of whatever I could, and I gradually fell more in love with your performance and personality overall. I have come to know how passionate and dedicated you are and have always been to music and performing. Even before Stray Kids was officially formed and debuted, you had music in your heart and I can see that clearly every time that you go on stage with your members. Not only do you have a naturally beautiful voice evident of vocal capability and strength, but your dancing skills are rigid and flawless beyond words. Your presence on stage is nothing less than inspirational and you ground and center your members in a way that I’ve never seen before. You always bring everyone together and emit unity on and off the stage. Outside of your musical performances, however, I have gotten the pleasure of getting to know you and your personality. I don’t even really know where to start by how touched I am at the positive impact you have already made on this world despite still having so much more left to say. Before I became a Stay, I didn’t know much about what Stray Kids had gone through to get where they are now; and I didn’t know just how much you went through either. However, the loving Stay introduced me to how hard you worked individually to keep your members’ heads above water through the rigorous days of training, performing, and other events that swarmed you. I was, and still am absolutely mesmerized at what you have accomplished to make this group possible, and successful beyond its comprehension. Thanks to the Stay, I know that before Stray Kids even debuted, you formed an unbreakable and unique bond with each of the members as well as one together as a whole. You lift your members up with the emotional and motivational weight of all the words that you’ve ever said to them. To know that there would be no Stray Kids without you makes me love you in a manner that is simply indescribable. I know that I, your members, and the Stay have so much respect and admiration for you because of everything that you’ve done and overcome in just the beginning of your musical journey. I have gotten the honor of seeing at least some of the group’s history and how it came to be, and seeing how you were a huge part of that makes me appreciate having you in my life more than I did before. You have single-handedly helped carry this group to victory and done so much to ensure that you stay together. You have always kept your promise that you, in words that I once heard you say, “Don’t leave anybody behind.” On top of leading your group to all of its success and glory, your are also humble and kind and always put them first. You sacrifice so much for your music, your members, and Stay and we recognize how hard you work day in and day out. You are so funny, clever, and know not to take life too seriously. At the same time you are professional, intelligent, respectful, and wise beyond your years. You are every bit qualified to be the leader that you are and I hope you never doubt your capability of doing that because Stay have seen you build something beautiful with your own two hands from the ground up. You never gave up even when the world encouraged you to and from that I find so much inspiration that I don’t even know how how to thank you. All I do know is that your family and parents are the most proud of you and love you more than any of us do. I can’t even imagine how strong they think you are for what you’ve created. I don’t want to put any more pressure or a burden on you, but so much would crash and burn without you and I hope that our love and support is enough to lift you up through your darkest times. You deserve so many blessings and praise. I just hope that you know your efforts are being recognized every second and that Stay, your members, and your family love you beyond words. I can’t thank you enough for everything that you’ve already done. You make Stay and your members feel so valued and desired and I know that only you can do that. I can’t wait to see what you do next because I know that I couldn’t leave you or stop supporting you if I tried. On behalf of your friends, Stay, members, and most importantly family, I pray that this birthday is filled with all of those blessings that you deserve and that it’s everything that you desire. I pray that you and your loved ones remain in good good health and good faith, because the world is relying on it in order to fully heal and love each other. Happy birthday Bang Chan, and from the bottom of my heart, we absolutely adore you. You make Stray Kids all around the world stay.

text:
вот и прошёл год с выхода легендарнейшей песни. она стала моим домом, моим комфортном. она прошла со мной столько событий, сколько не прошёл со мной ни один человек. я под неё и плакала, и радовалась, и флиртовала. я думаю вы уже поняли о какой песне идёт речь - это драйв от двух самых замечательных парней на свете - минхо и чана. эти двое мальчиков написали настолько чудесную песню...и заставили многих в неё влюбиться. как вы поняли я не исключение...
с днём драйва от банхо!

author: @choose2bekindd
text:
“神はそのひとり子を賜わったほどに、この世を愛して下さった。それは御子を信じる者がひとりも滅びないで、永遠の命を得るためである。 神が御子を世につかわされたのは、世をさばくためではなく、御子によって、この世が救われるためである。” ‭‭ヨハネによる福音書‬ ‭3:16-17‬ ‭口語訳‬‬ 

“すべて重荷を負うて苦労している者は、わたしのもとにきなさい。あなたがたを休ませてあげよう。 わたしは柔和で心のへりくだった者であるから、わたしのくびきを負うて、わたしに学びなさい。そうすれば、あなたがたの魂に休みが与えられるであろう。” ‭‭マタイによる福音書‬ ‭11:28-29‬ ‭口語訳‬‬

author: @choose2bekindd
text:
“수고하고 무거운 짐진 자들아 다 내게로 오라 내가 너희를 쉬게 하리라 나는 마음이 온유하고 겸손하니 나의 멍에를 메고 내게 배우라 그러면 너희 마음이 쉼을 얻으리니 이는 내 멍에는 쉽고 내 짐은 가벼움이라 하시니라” ‭‭마태복음‬ ‭11:28-30‬ ‭KRV‬‬ 

“하나님이 세상을 이처럼 사랑하사 독생자를 주셨으니 이는 저를 믿는 자마다 멸망치 않고 영생을 얻게 하려 하심이니라 하나님이 그 아들을 세상에 보내신 것은 세상을 심판하려 하심이 아니요 저로 말미암아 세상이 구원을 받게하려 하심이라 저를 믿는 자는 심판을 받지 아니하는 것이요 믿지 아니하는 자는 하나님의 독생자의 이름을 믿지 아니하므로 벌써 심판을 받은 것이니라” ‭‭요한복음‬ ‭3:16-18‬ ‭

author: @valeria9833
text:
here are the lines that REALLY gives the message away

1) "Drive non-stop, feel the heat inside..."
2) "Just trust and follow me tonight..."
3) "You don't need to hold back, it's our drive..."
4) "I think I've seen this scene a lot in my dreams..."
5) "Ride on the highway to heaven..."
6) "A special connection just between the two of us..."
7) "Feel the adrenaline, acceleration..."
8) "In the course we'll be driving so rough..."
9) "Ride like the motions of the ocean..."
10) "Hold on tight as it speeds up..."
11) "Again, I dream of heading to the top with you..."
12) "(Drive) In the course, in the night..."

LIKE BRO- but really, this song is a bop, i love it
